source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a low-angle wide shot, featuring a man positioned in the center of the frame, in the middle ground, on a balcony. The dark, perforated metal railing of the balcony is in the foreground relative to the man. The angular, grey concrete building occupies the background, with an overhanging section at the top of the frame. A bright, circular light fixture is visible on the top right, attached to the underside of the building's upper level, in the middle ground, while the overcast sky forms the upper background. The camera then swiftly tilts downwards, transitioning to show a blurred group of people on a lower balcony, now occupying the lower portion of the frame in the middle ground.
